title: What is the interpretation of seeing Yasmine’s full name in a dream?

preview.html: Why is the name Yasmine in a dream considered one of the largest books by experts in jurisprudence and dreams, as well as through the Trend website specializing in the science of dream interpretation, so we provide you with all the facts and figures. Details of the complete interpretation of the name Yasmine in a dream for women, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. Why dream of the name Yasmine in a dream for a common woman? The interpretation of seeing the full name of Yasmine in a dream for a common woman is evidence that she heard good and happy news. Also, seeing the full name of Yasmine in a dream means entering into the life of Full of happiness and great joy for the viewer. Seeing Yasmine’s full name in a dream and writing it is a vision of kindness, livelihood and money that the girl will collect in her life. Seeing or hearing the name Yasmine in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will have a successful marriage in the near future. Why dream of the name Yasmine In a married woman’s dream, seeing the written name Yasmine in a married woman’s dream is evidence of marital happiness, comfort, peace, and stability. Also, seeing the name Yasmine in a married woman’s dream indicates mutual love, tenderness, and successful marital relationships. The interpretation of seeing the full name Yasmine in a woman’s dream is evidence of the cessation of her worries and problems. Which she suffers from. Why does a pregnant woman dream of the name Yasmine in a dream? Seeing the name Yasmine written in front of a pregnant woman in a complete dream means that she will be blessed with a beautiful girl with good qualities. Also, seeing Jasmine completely in a dream for a pregnant woman is a harbinger of kindness, happiness, and an easy and smooth exit from childbirth. Seeing the full name Yasmine in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the end of her troubles and all the problems she faced during pregnancy. Why does the name Yasmine dream in a dream about a man? The interpretation of seeing the full name Yasmine in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates that in the coming days he will be blessed with a good and righteous wife. Also, seeing the full name Yasmine in a dream for a married woman means happiness, kindness, saving money, and carrying his wife. Seeing the full name Yasmine in a dream for a man as a whole indicates support and blessing in his life and collecting lawful money. This vision shows that the dreamer has achieved the goals he aspired to in life. It indicates the satisfaction of desires. The full name of Yasmine in a dream written on the wall shows the end of the worries and problems that the man suffers from. The meaning of the name Yasmine in a dream. The full name Yasmine in a dream means goodness, getting rid of problems and obstacles, getting rid of those who hate the dreamer. Seeing the name Yasmine written on A stone in a dream indicates to the dreamer that he will fulfill a long-awaited wish. If you have a dream and want its interpretation, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, eating apples in a dream, and buying apples in a dream.

preview.html: An apple in a dream Apples are considered one of the basic and necessary fruits found in every home because of their many benefits to humans, especially in ridding the body of toxins. The origin of apple cultivation goes back to Central Asia, but what is the importance of this? Do you see apples in a dream? What is the meaning of this dream? This vision has many meanings that vary depending on several factors, including the color of the apple. It can be red, green, or yellow, and it can be edible or rotten. In this article, we will list all the details and indications for it. Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream. An apple in a dream. Apples in a dream indicate correct thinking, enjoying experience and wisdom, the desire for knowledge and its acquisition, and traveling for the sake of this noble goal. Seeing apples is a sign of the rewards that a person will receive after completing his work and after completing the tasks assigned to him. Seeing apples also indicates On many benefits, abundant goodness and blessings, high morale, and a true desire to achieve all goals and satisfy all other desires, no matter how difficult the path may be. If the fortuneteller is a merchant, then seeing apples in his dream means a lot of money and a high percentage of profit, and participating in many From the projects you will gain many material and moral benefits. Seeing apples is an indication of the hope that the person places in every step he takes and the great effort he makes to achieve the purpose of the work he undertakes. Seeing apples also symbolizes the art or essence that the person expresses. For the farmer, the apple represents his harvest and tillage, for the merchant it represents his money and trade, for the worker it represents his work and deeds, and for the ruler it symbolizes his command and wealth. If one sees apples in a dream, this is an indication of halal profits, the legitimate sources through which one earns his money, and a noticeable improvement. In his circumstances, avoid temptations and temptations. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin goes on to interpret the vision of apples and says: Whoever sees apples, obtains sustenance from money and children, gains prestige and prestige. Among people, and his condition changed for the better. Seeing apples could be a great desire and ambition that a person pursues with all effort and diligence, and the fruits that will be reaped in the end as compensation for his patience and work. If one sees apples, this is a reflection of one’s spirit and determination, and the extent of his passion and enthusiasm for new projects and experiences. Which he will conduct, and the vision here indicates indicators of success and failure. Ibn Sirin believes that the apple also expresses good morals and personality, as this vision indicates a person who is good-looking and has good qualities, who impresses people with his fluency in language, decency and respect. Nabul Points Apples will be considered among the fruits that indicate Intercourse or marriage and the desires that satisfy the person are in the right range, so seeing a couple is an indicator of the success of the marital relationship. It also expresses the

preview.html: The colors of pigeons also have a meaning and interpretation, and we will learn together in the following lines from our website translated into interpreting a dream about pigeons, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a single girl. A dove in one dream also symbolizes insight, increased awareness, and the ability to reveal truths. Also, Understanding interior design, all of which are good traits, expresses the dreamer's personality. Seeing a dove flying in a dream means that the dreamer loves freedom. Always looking for herself away from old ideas and beliefs that limit a woman's ambitions. Whether a white dove in general expresses a friendly personality And good. Also, seeing a dove is a harbinger of comfort, the end of misfortunes, and hearing good news. If an unmarried woman sees a dove flying towards her, she may receive good news or a happy event in the coming days. Whoever has a dove in his dream will have a great wish come true. Eating a dove in a dream is for him Different meanings, for someone who ate a pigeon in a dream and it was raw. She must beware of offending one of her gender. If she dreams of eating a group of cooked stuffed pigeons, this indicates a dream about goodness, abundance of benefits, and the blessings of the diet, health, and good circumstances, with permission. God. Seeing people eating pigeons in a dream is a sign that there are some men near her. Who trample on women’s rights and treat them, and God knows best. Likewise, many raw pigeons in a dream is a metaphor for women’s conversations that are not devoid of gossip. Dead pigeons symbolize The dream indicates disappointment and separation from the beloved. Killing pigeons in a dream is a metaphor for oppressing others and distorting their reputation by lying and consuming their rights. A large dove in a dream expresses many desires and ambitions. As for a small dove, it symbolizes contentment, simple goals, and contentment while accepting them, and God knows best. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream. Alienation, treating children harshly, and hurting their feelings. Brown pigeons in a dream are evidence of overcoming crises and dealing with problems. Difficult things in life with wisdom and the ability to make good decisions. Eating raw pigeons is evidence that the dreamer shows people the opposite of the evil and hatred hidden in their souls. Either She eats cooked pigeons, and a lot of sustenance and livelihood. When a married woman sees in a dream a dove standing on her shoulder. It is evidence that there is someone who supports her and supports her to be better, whether her husband, family, or friends, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a man and its meaning for a dove in a man’s dream It has many meanings, and one of the most important of these meanings is that it represents the righteous wife who wants to please her husband, his money, and his children, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream from Ibn Sirin for single people, married people, and men. In this article, interpretations of dreams vary from one person to another depending on the nature of his life, work, and those around him. Each of us has different life circumstances through which the interpretation of a dream varies, and the dream often expresses what constantly occupies our minds, and in this article from the encyclopedia we show you the interpretation of the color blue in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin: seeing the color dark blue in a dream. It indicates that there will soon be a transitional phase and that the dreamer will witness a change in his life by traveling, moving to another place, or traveling to work and study soon. Seeing the color indigo blue in a dream. It indicates the dreamer's closeness to Almighty God and that he has a pure soul and pure intention. Seeing the color blue in a dream. It indicates the extent of psychological stability, enjoying strong psychological health and feeling happy most of the time. Blue clothes indicate distress and bad news. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a single woman. The visions and their interpretations vary depending on the degree of blue color that the unmarried girl sees and we explain it as follows: If she sees An unmarried girl dreams of a bouquet of blue roses. This indicates that he is in a happy relationship that will soon end in marriage. Also, seeing shades of blue indicates success, whether in work, study, or trade. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a blue veil. This refers to a pious, virtuous, kind and pure girl. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a blue dress, is this permissible? This indicates a good happy change in her life and that she will marry a suitable person soon. Seeing a girl wearing a blue patterned dress indicates how much peace, security and calm the girl enjoys, and it also shows the calmness of her life and the activity she enjoys. If an unmarried girl sees a light shade From the color blue “the color of the sky”, it means that this girl thinks a lot about how to make money and that she will have the abundant money that God Almighty will provide her. The color blue also indicates this girl’s upcoming journey, almost goodness or success in work and study. Seeing the color Blue in an unmarried girl’s dream also means that she will join one of the jobs she desires. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a married woman: The color blue is a degree of blue, and the color blue in general has some interpretations related to its different shades. Below is an explanation of the interpretation of the color blue in a woman’s dream. Married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is wearing blue clothes. This indicates that her husband will obtain a high position in his work and a prominent position, and that he will be blessed with an abundance of money. If a married woman sees the color blue on the walls of the house; This indicates the arrival of goodness to her and her family. If a married woman sees home furniture, the covers and curtains are blue. This indicates the arrival of many

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person giving a cat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a dead person giving a cat in a dream We will present several interpretations that express the interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving a cat in a dream and whether it is good or bad, according to scholars’ interpretations. And interpreters.Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person who gives a cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person who gives a cat in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a famous dead person who wants a big cat may indicate his need to beg, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees an old dead person who wants a colorful cat, this may be a sign of good news, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees a dead person He takes a cat from him, as it may express his will that he wants to carry out, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a sad cat in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a crying cat in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing a crying cat could be a sign of the weakness of the character of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. It can also express About his need for attention and care from those around him, and God knows the unseen. When you see a cat crying, it may indicate a woman’s deception, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a cat laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a laughing cat in a dream can indicate a happy life, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees a cat laughing in a dream. In a dream, this could be evidence of good events, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a pregnant woman sees many cats that she has talked to, perhaps this indicates people trying to harm her, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a cat asking for help in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a cat asking for help in a dream. And if the dreamer sees feeding a cat with meat, this may lead to marital infidelity, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat hitting a leg in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a cat falling under a leg. In a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a cat colliding with a car in a dream can be evidence of getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. While seeing a cat colliding with a car and dying can express injustice and persecution, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a married woman dreams of being hit by a cat With a car, this may indicate the presence of a problem, and God knows best. If a girl sees in a dream a wild cat colliding with a car, this may express psychological problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking my child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about cats attacking my child in a dream. She can express her justice and care for her children, and God Almighty is High. title: Interpretation of watermelon in a dream: Eating watermelon in a dream

preview.html: A dream about watermelon for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man who sees a rotten sweet and sour watermelon, to buy a yellow watermelon, to cut a cantaloupe and roses falling from the sky, a fruit farm by Ibn Sirin and more. Watermelon in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that we see in our dreams, especially in the season Summer comes with the appearance of the watermelon fruit in life, as it carries many important meanings for us. It is as if one of us sees a vision in his dream. He searches the websites for the correct interpretation, so the person with the vision must say the vision correctly so that he can get the correct and accurate interpretation. Like watermelon, it is a summer fruit that is distinguished by its delicious taste, its shape is round and oval, and it is distinguished by its green and yellow color. Interpretation of watermelon in a dream: Seeing fruit in general is a sign of goodness and blessings for the pioneer, and watermelon in a dream indicates the benefit and livelihood that the dreamer gets in his real life. Eating watermelon indicates Watermelon in a dream indicates your need to relax, slow down, and take a break. Interpretation of watermelon in a dream for single men and women. Whoever sees a watermelon fruit in his dream, his vision indicates marriage and getting married in the coming days, God willing. Sweet watermelon food in a dream indicates the goodness and food that comes to the dreamer in reality, so whoever He tastes cantaloupe and eats it in a dream and it tastes sweet, we announce the coming of days that will bring him goodness, food, happiness and joy. The person who is afflicted or afflicted with grief and sadness, if he sees that he is eating cantaloupe in a dream, then his vision indicates the disappearance of worry and distress, the emergence of comfort, and the achievement of comfort, happiness and peace. Mind in the coming days, God willing, especially if the dreamer is suffering from some life problems that cause him distress and anxiety, then their solution will soon, God willing. From eating spoiled or sour watermelon, if its taste is objectionable or a taste that cannot be tolerated in reality, then the vision indicates calamities. And the worries that beset the pioneer in his reality. A need in his real life. Whoever sees in his dream certain types of liquid fruits, such as watermelon, then the vision indicates the diet and money that the dreamer earns in reality, but this money will not last in the dreamer’s possession, but if the vision is like that, any type of dry fruits, then the vision indicates To live with money and obtain it in reality, where it lasts and remains in the possession of the dreamer, God willing. Seeing watermelon in a dream means illness or a sick person. If the watermelon you saw is green, this is a sign of a healthy body. If you dream that you are extending your hand towards the sky to eat watermelon, this indicates Ask the king and take it quickly. In case you dream that you are eating watermelon, this indicates a way out of prison or a difficult situation. If the watermelon you dreamed of is an Indian watermelon, this is a sign that people see you as heavy and cold. If you love a young man and do not know his feelings towards you and dream of watermelon , this is a good omen. If you want to engage in business and you see a watermelon in a dream, this is a sign of bad luck and loss in the project. To dream of a yellow watermelon indicates illness and disease. title: What is the interpretation of baking in a dream?

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of hibiscus in a dream in different situations. Molokhia is one of the delicious foods that everyone enjoys eating because of its delicious taste and many health benefits. But what does it mean to dream of seeing molokhia in a dream? What is the meaning of this dream? We will learn this in detail in the following lines of our article for today on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of molokhiya in a dream Ibn Sirin believes that seeing molokhiya in a dream is one of the good visions that heralds good news for its owner and indicates a permissible diet and obedience to God. A man who sees mallow in his dream indicates that he A person who fears God in his source of livelihood and seeks what is permissible in his money. A single man who sees molokhiya in a dream is evidence that he will marry a respectable and beautiful woman, and that he will be happy with his marriage to this woman, and it indicates that their lives will be filled with goodness and blessings. It is an unpleasant vision for a person to see In a dream, the mallow has withered, it shows the difficulties that he will face in his life and the desires that he will not be able to achieve. And the merchant seeing many mallow leaves in his dream indicates that he will benefit from his trade and earn a lot of money from it, or that he is about to be on the verge of... It will be profitable, O God Almighty, and his financial return is very large and he will live with him a comfortable life. Interpretation of a dream about molokhiya for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees molokhiya in her dream, her vision indicates that she will achieve, by the grace and favor of God Almighty, her dreams and aspirations that she seeks with all her effort and that God God Almighty will crown her difficulties with success. If a girl sees that she is collecting a lot of molokhiya leaves, then this dream indicates that she will get a promotion at her job or she will find a new job from which she will get a lot of money. A girl’s vision of molokhiya indicates that she is a girl of origin. She is good and has good character, and she is famous for these qualities and is loved by everyone. Interpretation of a dream about eating molokhiya in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a baker in her dream indicates that she will get a lot of money and that she will spend this money in charity and with it she will help the needy and not spend it in a useless way. It is possible that this woman shows her care and concern for her children and is always ready to spread happiness in her family. For a married woman whose children God has not yet blessed, this dream is good news for her that she will soon be blessed with good offspring and that God will grant them her eyes. Green molokhiya appears in The life of a married woman is the happiness that she enjoys with her husband, and it also warns her that there are those who envy her because of this happiness. Interpretation of the curse of the dead in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased is eating baked bread and enjoys eating it, then this dream indicates that the deceased will enjoy his next life and that he was doing good deeds. Always fearing God Almighty and ready to perform acts of obedience, such as those that indicate his good fortune, God willing. And whoever sees in a dream that he is eating hibiscus with the dead, then this dream is good news for him, and God Almighty will satisfy him. There is a different interpretation of the dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on a shell by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on a shell in a dream: The shell is a masterpiece created by the Creator, His Majesty, and with which it adorns the seas and oceans. Seashells, with their beautiful colors and charming details, give the soul deep inner tranquility and tranquility, and the sea only completes beauty when the shell is buried in its bosom, so seeing shells in reality makes us feel... It's like we're in the depths of a dream. Beautiful, so what if we actually saw a seashell in our sleep? What are the interpretations of this dream? You will be presented with a website with various sufficient answers about the interpretation of a dream about walking on a shell in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about walking on a shell in a dream: Walking on a shell in reality and seeing the waves swaying on it in a wonderful way actually transports us to another world full of peace, tranquility and comfort, but is this true? Who walks on seashells in dreams and visions? This is what we will learn next: If the dreamer sees himself walking on seashells, this indicates that he is a person who loves to play, as the interpretation of the dream of walking on a shell in a dream, it indicates God’s extravagance in his real life. Seeing seashells in a dream can also mean that the dreamer regrets the act he committed, as it indicates A coincidence in a dream indicates that you are dealing with a person with a sharp and stubborn personality, but he is honest. Seeing shells in a dream can be interpreted as an indication that you will enjoy another person’s property. A coincidence also shows a servant who serves the people or the Lord. If a coincidence occurs in a dream, this indicates the end of the dreamer’s mandate and God. I know especially if he is suffering from an illness. As for the loss of seashells in a dream, it is the loss of a servant. Also, seashells in a dream can be a symbol of protection and safety. This vision can be interpreted as an introverted and introverted person in order to avoid emotional damage. This dream can be a message for the dreamer to confront his fears and get rid of them. It indicates many From seashells in a dream to a lot of nutrition It could be an indication of a change in the viewer’s opinion, whether positive or negative This dream may indicate that the dreamer will achieve his dreams and goals If the dreamer sees that he is eating seashells, it will be good for the dreamer Coincidence in the dream also indicates wealth and money If he feels The dreamer is afraid when he sees seashells, this indicates his need for help. Collecting seashells in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to make decisions and commit wrong actions. As for selling shells in a dream, it shows a lot of good that will happen to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about eating oysters in a dream: Eating oysters in a dream indicates Lack of faith and failure to preserve beauty. Eating oyster shells also indicates good news that the fortuneteller will hear. A lot of money also appears. Food coincidences can indicate moving to another country. Interpretation of removing pearls from the shell in a dream: Extracting pearls from the shell in a dream means that you are earning money through halal and legal methods. Pearls It also indicates luck and happiness. The interpretation of extracting pearls from shells can be a new business that brings profit to the fortuneteller. Interpretation of offering shells as a gift in a dream: The shell indicates...

title: Interpretation of berries in a dream: Seeing berries in a dream

preview.html: White berries in a dream. Cranberries in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about red berries. Raspberries in a dream for a single woman. Raspberries in a dream for a pregnant woman. Whole berries in a dream indicate a large profit that is beneficial to the dreamer. Black berries appear in dinars and white berries appear in dirhams. Berries are a man who has money and children. Berries indicate good faith and reassurance. Goodness and physical health for those who eat it. White berries appear in a person’s vision in a dream, and this is evidence that the person earns an amount of dirhams. Berries may also indicate the integrity of a person’s religion, his good faith in God, and his physical health. Berries in a dream are also evidence of joy, success, excellence in life, and earning sums of money. A large amount of money, and raspberries are evidence of love, faith, and physical well-being and indicate a large amount of money. Blackberries in a dream mean that the person will receive an amount of dinars. Raspberries in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted a group of dreams that explain the vision of the dreamer so that he can be sure of the vision that He saw it in his dream.. in the dreamer’s house. Seeing berries in a dream for a woman. In the event that a woman sees berries in general in a dream, it may mean that the family is giving birth to a new baby and indicates abundance of sustenance, marriage, and success in this world and the afterlife. Berries are considered one of the best fruits for the person who sees them, as they indicate loyalty, friendliness, and good qualities present in the character of the dreamer. If a woman sees herself buying berries from the market, this may mean that she will obtain comfort, success, success in life, goodness in morals, and getting rid of morals. Bad, it is evidence that the man earns a lot of halal money and success in a particular cause that bothers him. Seeing berries in a single woman’s dream. Seeing berries for an unmarried girl indicates recovery from illness and can be evidence of relief from the psychological and physical pain that may afflict the person who sees it. In addition to seeing red berries in a dream, it indicates that a man has status and has money and status. Seeing berries in a dream for a married woman. The presence of berries in a dream can indicate nutrition, pregnancy, comfort, and happiness in married life, and it can symbolize having children, good nutrition, and abundance in life. Marital. It is also evidence of the growing religiosity of married women and indicates good morals, stability and psychological tranquility. It can mean ambition and optimism in life, comfort and tranquility. It is also evidence of easy birth, without difficulty and without pain. It is good news from God Almighty, and the child will be righteous in his life. And good for his family. Interpretations of a dream about berries - YouTube

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about wearing gold for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold for a married woman: Gold is a type of jewelry that is famous for its pure yellow color, and it is made in different shapes and in different pieces such as rings, bracelets, earrings, etc., and what women crave most is what is presented to them. A wonderful and elegant look, and when a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing gold, of course she will be happy and search for an interpretation of the vision to know whether it is good or bad, so in this article we take a look at the most important things they said so that the commentators can follow us...! Interpretation of a dream about wearing Gold for a married womanCommentators say that seeing a married woman wearing gold in a dream means that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a son. Also, seeing a woman in her vision with golden bicycles and wearing them and they were heavy indicates that her husband is suffering from personal difficulty and is unable to coexist with him. Seeing gold and wearing it in a wonderful appearance in The dream of a lady symbolizes the enjoyment of money and a luxurious life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he finds a golden crown and wears it, it symbolizes the high position that he will soon reach and will be happy. A married woman who sees gold and wears it shows the purity and piety that she enjoyed in her life and the good reputation for which she is known. As for the dreamer who sees her husband wearing heavy gold, this is a result of the sins and transgressions he committed in his life and he must repent to God. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a golden ring, this means the birth of a male child and his nourishment. Lady, if she dreams of wearing a gold bracelet, this means She will obtain a prominent position in society. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman wearing gold by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing her husband in a dream of a married woman wearing yellow gold leads to misfortune or distress surrounding his life. Seeing and wearing gold in a dream symbolizes many good things. And blessings in her life. As for the dreamer who dreams of buying gold and wearing it, it symbolizes the abundance of sustenance and happiness that she will enjoy. Also, seeing a dreamer wearing precious gold coins in a dream portends her finding many solutions to the problems she faces. If a lady dreams of wearing gold and she is unhappy , it will create many problems for her male children. If a woman is not pregnant, and she sees gold in her dream and is wearing it, this gives her good news that the date of her dream is imminent. The fortuneteller received gold as a gift in her dream, which heralds great riches or the acquisition of a great inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold for a woman PregnantCommentators say that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing a golden ring means that she will be blessed with a male child. Also, the dreamer seeing a golden ring, wearing it, and feeling upset with it symbolizes exhaustion and difficulties in earning a living and money. If the dreamer sees in her dream that the ring she has in reality, then she She wears it in a dream, this indicates breastfeeding with good offspring and the newborn will be good with it. As for seeing gold and wearing it in the dreamer’s dream, and it was of great value, it foretells the goodness that will come to her and the happiness that will come to her.
